attributes.action: Ban the Burqa and all other face coverings
attributes.additional_details: All face coverings should be banned in public places, this improves security, identification and social cohesion in the communities m. Improves fairness and increases the sense of  fairness helping to decrease divisions
attributes.background: Ban all face coverings including the Burqa
